playing.description: State representing a video game that is in progress by a user

completed.description: State representing a video game that was completed by a user

planned.description: State representing a video game that is planned to be played by a user

dropped.description: State representing a video game that has been dropped by a user

onHold.description: State representing a video game that was started by a user but put on hold

pc.description: Games that are available on the PC platform

playstation.description: Games that are available on the playstation platform

xbox.description: Games that are available on the xbox platform

nintendo.description: Games that are available on the nintendo platform
